lead_paragraph: A fire swept through a plastic packaging factory on Saturday night in Bangladesh’s capital, Dhaka, killing at least 13 people, a fire department official said.

headline.main: Bangladesh: Factory Fire Kills at Least 13 People in the Capital
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh: Factory Fire Kills at Least 13 People in the Capital

snippet: A fire swept through a plastic packaging factory on Saturday night in Bangladesh’s capital, Dhaka, killing at least 13 people, a fire department official said.
